name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proactive Senior System Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong background in managing and optimizing systems using technologies such as **PowerShell**, **REST API**, **Windows Server**, and **Active Directory**. My hands-on expertise in enterprise-level deployment and systems integration ensures that operations are seamless and efficient, fostering robust team collaboration.
Fluent in both German and English, I emphasize cross-cultural communication in diverse working environments. I leverage my extensive knowledge to implement and support Exchange configurations while utilizing tools like **Baramundi** for effective IT asset management. I can rapidly troubleshoot and resolve system issues, ensuring high availability and performance for critical applications.
